segments.text: I ’ m not sure what you expect me to do , Michelle . You ’ Ve not been very clear about any of this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry , Clint . Maybe I didn ’ t make myself clear enough . We should get together to discuss this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . I think that would be a good idea . I ’ m really in the dark on everything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine . Let ’ s meet this afternoon . I ’ ll draw you a better picture of the situation .
segments.speaker: S2
